text: Just shipped a token on pump.fun and need a way to track real community sentiment vs bot noise. Anyone know a tool for this?
Evaluating signal detection tools for our DAO. Comparing Nansen vs Dune vs building custom. The noise-to-signal ratio on CT is killing us.
Another day another rug. When will we have real tools to detect scam tokens BEFORE people get rugged? The current solutions are broken.
Feature request for pump.fun: we need better analytics on which wallets are real users vs bots. The current metrics are meaningless.

Leaving Productboard. The feedback loop is too slow â€” by the time insights surface, we've already shipped the wrong thing. Looking for something that actually prioritizes in real time.
Shipped our token last week. The hardest part isn't the launch â€” it's figuring out if people actually care or if it's all bot activity. Need real signal detection.
The scam detection tools are broken. I've been rugged 3 times this month despite using multiple checkers. The honeypot detection especially doesn't work.

We switched from manual Discord monitoring to an automated signal pipeline and it's been incredible. Went from 2 days of synthesis to 2 hours. Building > buying for this use case.
Seriously considering building my own token analytics because nothing on the market cuts through the noise. The 10x returns hype drowns out actual utility discussion.
Bug report: the momentum detection in our feedback tool keeps flagging random spikes as trends. False positives are destroying trust with the product team.
Looking for signal intelligence tools in the crypto space. Need something that can separate genuine community growth from manufactured hype. DMs open.
Every 'AI feedback tool' I've tried just does sentiment analysis and calls it intelligence. I don't need vibes, I need to know what people are explicitly asking for.

Update on our signal detection search â€” still haven't found anything that handles the noise-to-signal problem well. The scam detection tools are broken, the analytics are surface-level. Building custom seems inevitable.
Beautiful day in Miami. Had great coffee this morning.
When will pump.fun add real analytics? The current dashboard is useless for understanding if your community is organic or farmed. This is critical for token utility.
Cancelled my Nansen subscription. The token analytics are decent but they completely miss the qualitative signal. I need to understand WHY people are buying, not just that they are.
Shipping a new release of our signal detection SDK. Added support for real-time intent classification. DM for early access. Building in public.
Third thread this week about broken scam detection. The honeypot problem is getting worse, not better. If someone doesn't build a real solution soon, thousands more will get drained.
